definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress

sentences.english: She exhorts me to accept that new position although that position reward is not munificent .
sentences.chinese: 她力勸我接受那個新職位，雖然那職位報酬並不優厚。

sentences.english: Did you choose this company on account of high pay (remuneration) ?
sentences.chinese: 你是因爲想獲得優厚的報酬才選擇本公司嗎？

sentences.english: They know the rewards are there if you're prepared to get your hands dirty.
sentences.chinese: 他們很清楚弄髒雙手幹體力活的報酬有多麼優厚。

sentences.english: I didn't give the dragoman a fat tip.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有給那個導遊優厚的小費。

sentences.english: Trace Foundation offers an excellent salary and benefit package.
sentences.chinese: 利衆基金會提供優厚的薪金待遇和全套福利。

sentences.english: Each time he gave the bartender a good tip.
sentences.chinese: 每次他都給酒保優厚的小費。

sentences.english: All the musicians who were chosen to play in the court were treated royally .
sentences.chinese: 而那些被挑選入宮的樂師，受到了特別優厚的待遇。

sentences.english: All the employees of the formal employ favourable welfare treatment.
sentences.chinese: 凡經正式錄用的員工提供優厚的福利待遇。

sentences.english: She was lucky to get such a well-paid job.
sentences.chinese: 她能得到這樣一個報酬優厚的工作真幸運。

sentences.english: Right now, our exports support millions upon millions of well-paying American jobs.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我們的出口支持了美國千百萬待遇優厚的工作。

sentences.english: Being a full-time employee, you are well paid and can enjoy insurance.
sentences.chinese: 成爲正式員工就能夠享受優厚待遇並有保險。

sentences.english: Trace Foundation offers competitive local salary and benefits.
sentences.chinese: 利衆基金會提供一個優厚當地薪酬及福利待遇。

sentences.english: She found a good-paying job with a transnational company.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家跨國公司裏找了一份薪水優厚的工作。

sentences.english: Duo to the vegetable market to buy vegetables, kang to show jade get better treatment.
sentences.chinese: 二人到菜市場買菜，康爲比秀玉獲得更優厚的待遇。

sentences.english: And they got some of the top jobs in the palace.
sentences.chinese: 他們還在宮廷中得到了優厚的職分。

sentences.english: I have a good-payed job with excellent hours.
sentences.chinese: 我有一份待遇優厚而且時段特佳的工作。
